page.title: 13FAMILY WEEKEND ALSAGER
page.content: {FRIDAY EVENING:}Piano practice, Swimming club, play with friends and then come in to watch Cosby show; bed. {SATURDAY MORNING:}Up early. Dad works, so all go into Hanley with him to do some shopping. Lunch at The Place. {SATURDAY AFTERNOON:}Mum watching Wimbledon while Dad, Emma and Rachel go on a bike ride to the Romping Donkey Inn and back. play with friends. Salad for tea followed by ice cream and fruit.Piano practice. French cricket on the lawn. T.V and bed. {SUNDAY:}Watched Good Morning Britain. Breakfast consisting of oatcakes, bacon and mushrooms. Walk to Christ Church, Alsager.Play on return. Barbeque for lunch.Watched Wimbledon Mens Tennis Final and then played with friends. Picnic tea for children only. bath and hair washed. Early to bed.
